t: Minka Group - 2025 Company Profile, Funding & Competitors - Tracxn
s: April 13, 2025 - Minka Group is an acquired company based in Corona (United States), founded in 1982. It operates as a Manufacturer of lighting fixtures. The company has 526 active competitors, including 12 funded and 68 that have exited.
